deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
Stipend gas of 2300 + 2x Transfer gas of 21000.
 This gas gets allocated in order to call the minion once the condition has been met
 This call alone costs 21000 intrinsic gas + ~1500 gas for emmiting an event once the
 automation fullfiled.
 The rest goes to refund the chainlink keeper for calling (21000) Automaton plus changes
 (20000~) in the state of automation once executed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

gasOverhead().notice: Stipend gas of 2300 + 2x Transfer gas of 21000. This gas gets allocated in order to call the minion once the condition has been met This call alone costs 21000 intrinsic gas + ~1500 gas for emmiting an event once the automation fullfiled. The rest goes to refund the chainlink keeper for calling (21000) Automaton plus changes (20000~) in the state of automation once executed.
